body: The functionality to add sandia models is now available as soon as Mostapha approves it. [https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/Honeybee/pull/458](https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/Honeybee/pull/458). Please use it like below. I am in the middle of moving continents and jobs but will try to polish it up and add the one diode model next week.
